name: Log Cabin On The Stream â€¢ Sundance, Utah

amenities.title: Private Cabin
amenities.description: Plus, your own private grounds right on the river including several decks, a pavilion, & hot tub.

amenities.title: Parking
amenities.description: Easy private parking is provided at the Log Cabin located on a private lane.

amenities.title: 1 King, 4 Queen, 4 Single Beds, 1 Sleeper Sofa
amenities.description: Plenty of room for family, friends, or corporate retreats in 5 rooms with 10 beds. If that's not enough room, consider booking our cabins next door on either side.

amenities.title: Walk to Sundance Mountain Resort
amenities.description: About 7 minutes easy walk from Sundance Mountain Resort, voted "Utah's Best Resort 2017" by Conde` Nest Traveler.

amenities.title: Jacuzzi / Hot Tub
amenities.description: Spend the days exploring Sundance Mountain Resort and all the hikes, biking, skiing, fly fishing and sights in the area, then relax those tired muscles in your own, private hot tub jacuzzi.

amenities.title: Amazing Views
amenities.description: The Log Cabin is surrounded by Big Pines and a beautiful, year round steam creating views from the deck that our guests describe as "story book views" they can't believe actually exist.

amenities.title: Propane BBQ Grill
amenities.description: Dine out at Sundance Resort Restaurants like The Tree Room, Foundry Grill, or the Owl Bar, or... Grill and dine in with your own propane BBQ grill just outside the door.

amenities.title: Find More on Instagram
amenities.description: Check out other guest's experience and share your own by searching & tagging your photos with #mtcabinsutguest & @mtcabinsutguide. We can't wait to meet you!!!

description info.title: Entire Cabin For Rent
description info.description: 16 guests   5 bedroom   9 bed   3 bath  8 Additional Areas  1 Man Cave/Game Room

description info.title: Sparkling clean
description info.description: Recent guests said this place was sparkling clean.

description info.title: Great location
description info.description: 90% of recent guests gave the location a 5-star rating.

description info.title: Super Host Status
description info.description: Mountain Cabins Utah has achieved top rankings for our Sundance, Utah cabins, on sites like AirBnB, VRBO.com, Booking.com, Expedia etc.

description info.title: Top Rated
description info.description: This vacation rental cabin maintains a 5-STAR rating on Google Reviews and most popular booking sites!
